messages.content:
Here's the user journal payload:

      ```json
        {
          "userId": "eac7a34d-f08e-4846-a646-cf107fe544ee"
          "title": "i'm going to the deepest low",
          "body": "i dont think i'll ever get a job, job hunting process didnt go as planned. My life is going on a downward spiral also",
          "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["catastrophizing","over_generalization"]
        }
      ```

      1. Call **distortion_detection** to take the payload, analyze, breakdown and suggest a feedback
      2. Call **enemies_generation** to build 6 alternative stories in a specified enemy json format

          }
        ```

            "userId": "a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6"
            "title": "i hate myself",
            "body": "Every time I walk into class lately, I feel like I’m faking it. I used to love this subject, but now I just feel lost. The others are debating theories and citing papers from memory — meanwhile, I’m rereading the same sentence three times and still not getting it. ",
            "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["labeling","mind_reading"]
          }
        ```

        ```json
          {
            "userId": "a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6"
            "title": "i was never good enough",
            "body": "Maybe I was never smart enough to be here. Maybe I just got lucky for the first few years. I’ve coasted. Now that it’s the end and things are actually hard, it’s becoming obvious I don’t belong.",
            "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["over_generalization","labeling"]
          }
        ```

        1. Call **distortion_detection** to take the payload, analyze, breakdown and suggest a feedback
        2. Call **enemies_generation** to build 6 alternative stories in a specified enemy json format

Here's the user journal payload:

        ```json
          {
            "userId": "a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6"
            "title": "i dont know what to do",
            "body": "I tried to talk to my professor about the final project, and she seemed polite but distant. Probably thinks I’m not worth investing time in. If I were a “real” student, I wouldn’t need help this late in the game.",
            "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["catastrophizing","emotional_reasoning"]
          }
        ```

        1. Call **distortion_detection** to take the payload, analyze, breakdown and suggest a feedback
        2. Call **enemies_generation** to build 6 alternative stories in a specified enemy json format

Here's the user journal payload:

        ```json
          {
            "userId": "a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6"
            "title": "i dont know what to do",
            "body": "It feels like no matter how much I study, it doesn’t stick. If I’m not performing at the top, what’s the point? I’m average at best — and in this field, average is invisible.",
            "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["all_or_nothing_thinking","minimization_of_the_positive"]
          }
        ```

        1. Call **distortion_detection** to take the payload, analyze, breakdown and suggest a feedback
        2. Call **enemies_generation** to build 6 alternative stories in a specified enemy json format

function.arguments: {"payload":{"userId":"a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6","body":"It feels like no matter how much I study, it doesn’t stick. If I’m not performing at the top, what’s the point? I’m average at best — and in this field, average is invisible.","cognitiveDistortionIds":["all_or_nothing_thinking","minimization_of_the_positive"],"contextKeywords":["studying","performance","average","invisible"]}}

messages.content: {"success":true,"data":{"id":"ffaf50df-7e5a-472f-8b6b-4cbcd9dc1ef9","journalAnalysis":{"insight":{"distortions":[{"id":"all_or_nothing_thinking","type":"All-or-Nothing Thinking","description":"You may be viewing your performance in extremes – either you are at the top or you are invisible. This kind of thinking can be harsh, as it overlooks the effort you put in and the progress you may have made. Remember, every step forward counts!"},{"id":"minimization_of_the_positive","type":"Minimization of the Positive","description":"You seem to be downplaying any achievements by labeling yourself as ‘average.’ This can make it feel like your efforts are futile. Instead, try to recognize and celebrate even small wins, as they contribute to your overall progress."}],"feedback":"It's great that you're identifying these distortions! Recognizing them is the first step toward changing your perspective. Keep challenging these thoughts; you are doing better than you think!"}},"metadata":{"neighbors":[{"contextKeywords":["self-doubt","academic pressure","feelings of inadequacy"],"cognitiveDistortionIds":["over_generalization","labeling"]},{"contextKeywords":["self-doubt","academic pressure","social comparison"],"cognitiveDistortionIds":["labeling","mind_reading"]},{"contextKeywords":["professor","final project","help","real student","distant"],"cognitiveDistortionIds":["catastrophizing","emotional_reasoning"]},{"contextKeywords":["studying","performance","average","invisible"],"cognitiveDistortionIds":["all_or_nothing_thinking","minimization_of_the_positive"]}],"contextKeywords":["studying","performance","average","invisible"]}}}
